input.sentences: i love to play the games at the fair . i hope i win !
next stop is food . what should i choose ?
the ferris wheel is always a favorite ride of mine .
i hope this is n't too scary in here .
it 's sunny out | i think i should get a hat .
output.sentences: I wanted to win a stuffed animal so I wanted to play for something I loved.
afterwards, I made a stop for food and had hotdogs to choose.
I saw a ferris wheel and wanted to ride one because it's a dream of mine.
I then saw a ride that looked scary and I had hope it wouldn't be that bad.
finally at the end of the day it became really sunny so I bought a hat.
